General.Name: Hangzhou Haoyue Personal Care Co Ltd
General.Description: Hangzhou Haoyue Personal Care Co., Ltd. research, develops, manufactures, and sells women, young, and adult health care products under the haoyue name in China. It produces baby step pants, paper diapers, wet towels, adult Lala pants, diapers, nursing mats, female sanitary napkins, menstrual care pants, maternity and baby dual-use napkins, and parturient towels. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
